mailBody:
Dear J.P. Morgan Securities PLC Team,

We are reaching out to request additional information that is currently missing in our records. Specifically, we need the following data: 
1. PEP Screening results. 
2. Revenue details. 
3. Market Capitalization details. 

Your prompt response will be appreciated to help us complete the necessary documentation.

Thank you!

Best regards,
[Your Name]
